titles.title: Expanding Dependent and Child Care Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the exclusion for employer-provided dependent care assistance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/8/2011--Introduced. Expanding Dependent and Child Care Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $7,500 the amount of employer-provided dependent care assistance that an employee may exclude from gross income. Allows an annual inflation adjustment to such increased amount after 2012.
